title: Burkina Faso: No amnesty for soldiers who killed unarmed civilians (Amnesty International USA)
text: ( Source : Amnesty International USA ) Burkina Faso 's former presidential guard displayed a cold-blooded disregard for human life, killing 14 unarmed protestors and bystanders and wounding hundreds more with automatic weapons following last
